A4.text: Hootie & the Blowfish is an American rock band formed in Columbia, South Carolina, in 1986.

A5.text: The band's debut album, Cracked Rear View (1994), became one of the best-selling albums in the United States and was certified platinum 22 times.

A6.text: Cracked Rear View is the debut studio album by Hootie & the Blowfish, released on July 5, 1994, by Atlantic Records.
